p: Let me be responsible and take care of my mental health needs!

thead: Questions to ask myself/points to ponder
tbody: Have I set the right time, place and day to schedule these sessions for myself, by myself?(I need to spend at least half an hour on 2-3 occasions per week.)
<textarea rows='2' style='resize: none;' class='td-1-2 form-control'></textarea>
If I am feeling helpless and pessimistic about this program, is this probably a symptom of depression itself?
<textarea rows='2' style='resize: none;' class='td-2-2 form-control'></textarea>
Can I use and consistently practice what is relevant to me?Can I give it a good try?
<textarea rows='2' style='resize: none;' class='td-3-2 form-control'></textarea>
Can I focus on small gains I can make?
<textarea rows='2' style='resize: none;' class='td-4-2 form-control'></textarea>
Will it help me if I expect ups and downs and not get easily disheartened by these?
<textarea rows='2' style='resize: none;' class='td-5-2 form-control'></textarea>
Do I value small steps I take and the efforts I make?
<textarea rows='2' style='resize: none;' class='td-6-2 form-control'></textarea>
Let me visualize recovering from depressed mood.
<textarea rows='2' style='resize: none;' class='td-7-2 form-control'></textarea>
Is it not worth investing time and efforts in taking care to feel and function well?
<textarea rows='2' style='resize: none;' class='td-8-2 form-control'></textarea>
What are those little things I did -based on the program -for which I need to pat myself on my back?
<textarea rows='2' style='resize: none;' class='td-9-2 form-control'></textarea>
Can I take someone's help in order to complete this program?
<textarea rows='2' style='resize: none;' class='td-10-2 form-control'></textarea>
What can inspire me? Can I keep such cues close to me?
<textarea rows='2' style='resize: none;' class='td-11-2 form-control'></textarea>
What motivational statements I can use to help me?
<textarea rows='2' style='resize: none;' class='td-12-2 form-control'></textarea>
